server.objects.interfaces

Interface DiscussionSubjectInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscussionSubject

    public interface DiscussionSubjectInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A remote object interface for all discussion subject (sport, cinema, music, ...)
    Author:
    Grumpy Group

        boolean isConnected(ClientDisplayerInterface client)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Return true if the client in parameter is connected on this discussion

        client - ClientDisplayerInterface - The client to search in the registered clients list
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the client is registered on this discussion, false otherwise
